text: is the concept of "root of a vector of polynomials" well defined and universally accepted, or is it a slight abuse of notation?

elements.text: is the concept of "root of a vector of polynomials" well defined and universally accepted, or is it a slight abuse of notation?

text: Do you mean N polynomials in N unknowns? Mathematically that is the zero locus of an algebraic variety (if I have the names right).
